actors.name: Tom Hanks
actors.bio: Thomas Jeffrey Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker known for both comedic and dramatic roles.

actors.name: Meryl Streep
actors.bio: Mary Louise Streep is an American actress often described as the best actress of her generation.

actors.name: Leonardo DiCaprio
actors.bio: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio is an American actor and film producer known for his work in biopics and period films.

actors.name: Cate Blanchett
actors.bio: Catherine Elise Blanchett is an Australian actor and producer, regarded as one of the finest actresses of her generation.

actors.name: Denzel Washington
actors.bio: Denzel Hayes Washington Jr. is an American actor, producer, and director known for his dramatic roles.
